features: Expense tracking: Record daily expenses with amount, category, and description.
Budget management: Set monthly budgets for different categories and track spending against limits.
Category system: Organize expenses into customizable categories for detailed analysis.
Report generation: View spending reports by category, time period, or custom criteria.
Recurring expenses: Set up automatic entries for regular bills and subscriptions.
Income tracking: Record income sources to calculate net cash flow and savings.
Multi-currency support: Track expenses in different currencies with automatic conversion.
Export functionality: Download financial data in CSV or PDF format for external analysis.
Search and filtering: Find specific transactions using date ranges, categories, or amounts.
Privacy focused: All financial data stored securely on your own server.
Mobile responsive: Log expenses on the go from any device with responsive interface.
Simple interface: Minimal design focuses on essential features without complexity.
